DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, open-label, 1-arm, multicenter observational study to determine the average Remicade dosage and time span between 9 infusions in subjects with rheumatoid arthritis (RA)
DOC.brief_title: Real Life Dosing of Remicade for Rheumatoid Arthritis in Austria Monitored Over 9 Infusions (Study P03756)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: This study population was chosen from a non-probability sample.
DOC.criteria: Severe RA (indication according to Austrian labeling). According to Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC).
